发送登录或验证用邮箱验证码。

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"mobile":{"type":"string"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"验证码用途/类型"},"channel":{"type":"string"},"captchaUid":{"type":"string"},"captchaCode":{"type":"string"}},"description":"提供手机号或邮箱其一","title":"CodeSendRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
